name: #002 - Wave
description:
This is the collection of "Isekai Anime Characters" Monochrome ver.
There are 4 designs within the collection: Pulse, Ray, Wave, and Battle.

"Isekai Anime Characters" are handmade NFTs in which every character is drawn carefully one by one.
The first editions (Genesis 0) is limited to only 50 in the world.
We look forward to offers from enthusiastic fans with the desire to spread Japanese anime culture to the world through crypto art.
https://opensea.io/collection/isekai-anime-characters
